conclusion: Velocity selector uses crossed electric and magnetic fields.
Electric force must balance magnetic force for ions to pass through undeflected: qE = qvB.
Velocity of ions after velocity selector is v = E/B.
Ions enter magnetic analyzer moving in a circular path due to magnetic field.
Radius of circular path is R = mv/qB.
Substitute v = E/B into radius equation: R = mE/qB^2.
Charge-to-mass ratio of ions is q/m = E/RB^2.
Conclusion: Velocity of ions is v = E/B.
Conclusion: Charge-to-mass ratio is q/m = E/RB^2.
